metadata.title: CVE-2023-7207 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Debian's cpio contains a path traversal vulnerability. This issue wasintroduced by reverting CVE-2015-1197 patches which had caused aregression in --no-absolute-filenames. Upstream has since provided aproper fix to --no-absolute-filenames.

criterions.comment: cpio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
